code: import i18n from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import translation_en from"./en.json";import translation_zh from"./zh.json";var resources={en:{translation:translation_en},zh:{translation:translation_zh}};i18n.use(initReactI18next).init({resources:resources,lng:"zh",interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
